366            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
367            if (self.pageNumber+step) > maxPage-1:
368                self.pageNumber = 0
369            elif (self.pageNumber+step) <0:
370                self.pageNumber = maxPage-1
371            else:
372                self.pageNumber  = self.pageNumber+step
373            self.updateImages()
374            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
375            if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:",self.pageNumber," | max page:",maxPage,")")
376
377    def updateImages(self):
378        """
379        Refresh image display for current page.
380        
381        Updates all image widgets in the grid with placeholder content
382        and refreshes the page number display. Actual images are loaded
383        asynchronously by the model.
384        """
385        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages(",")")
386
387        """ update images content """
388        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
389        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
390        
391        index=0
392        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
393            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
394                # get image controllers                                                                                         
395                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
396                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())                                                 
397                index +=1                                                                                                                                                                                                           
398        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber)+"/"+str(maxPage-1))
399
400    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
401        """
402        Update specific image in grid with loaded content.
403        
404        Args:
405            idx (int): Index of image within current page
406            processPipe (ProcessPipe): Loaded image processing pipeline
407            filename (str): Image filename for status display
408        """
409        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage(",")")
410        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]                                 
411        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
412        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image "+filename+" done!")
413
414    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
415        """
416        Clear current grid layout widgets.
417        
418        Removes all image widgets from the grid layout and cleans up
419        memory by deleting widget references.
420        """
421        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
422
423        for w in self.imagesControllers:
424            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
425            w.view.deleteLater()
426        self.imagesControllers = []
427
428    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
429        """
430        Create new grid layout widgets based on current shape mode.
431        
432        Generates ImageWidgetController instances for each position in
433        the grid and adds them to the layout with proper positioning.
434        """
435        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
436
437        imageIndex = 0
438        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
439            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
440                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
441                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
442                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view,i,j)
443                imageIndex +=1
444
445    def wheelEvent(self, event):
446        """
447        Handle mouse wheel navigation between pages.
448        
449        Args:
450            event: Qt wheel event with scroll direction
451        """
452        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent(",")")
453
454        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0 :     
455            self.changePageNumber(+1)
456            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
457                self.controller.selectImage(0)
458
459        else :                              
460            self.changePageNumber(-1)
461            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
462                self.controller.selectImage(0)
463        event.accept()
464
465    def mousePressEvent(self,event):
466        """
467        Handle image selection clicks.
468        
469        Determines which image was clicked based on mouse position
470        and notifies the controller for selection handling.
471        
472        Args:
473            event: Qt mouse press event with position
474        """
475        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent(",")")
476
477        # self.childAt(event.pos()) return QLabel .parent() should be ImageWidget object
478        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(),ImageWidgetView):
479            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
480        else:
481            id = -1
482
483        if id != -1: # an image is clicked select it!
484            self.controller.selectImage(id)
485        event.accept()

Grid-based image gallery with pagination and navigation controls.

Displays multiple images in a configurable grid layout with pagination support for large image collections. Provides interactive navigation buttons and supports different grid configurations (1x1, 3x2, 6x4, 9x6).

Layout Structure: +-------------------------------------------+ | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | > GridLayout | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | | | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| | | | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | / +-------------------------------------------+ < splitter | [<] [1x1][3x2][6x4][9x6][page number] [>] | [pushButton] HorizontalLayout +-------------------------------------------+

Attributes: - controller: Reference to ImageGalleryController - shapeMode: Current grid layout mode (GalleryMode enum) - pageNumber (int): Current page index (0-based) - imagesControllers (list): List of ImageWidgetController instances - images (QFrame): Frame containing image grid - imagesLayout (QGridLayout): Grid layout for images - buttons (QWidget): Navigation button container - pageNumberLabel (QLabel): Current page display

ImageGalleryView(controller_=None, shapeMode=None) 
281    def __init__(self,controller_=None,shapeMode=None):
282        """
283        Initialize image gallery view.
284        
285        Args:
286            controller_: Parent ImageGalleryController instance
287            shapeMode: Initial grid layout mode (defaults to 3x2)
288        """
289        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.__init__(",")")
290
291        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
292
293        self.controller= controller_
294        self.shapeMode = controller.GalleryMode._3x2 if not shapeMode else shapeMode    # default display mode 
295        self.pageNumber =0
296
297        self.imagesControllers = []
298
299        self.images = QFrame()
300        self.images.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
301        self.imagesLayout = QGridLayout()
302        self.images.setLayout(self.imagesLayout)
303
304        self.buildGridLayoutWidgets()
305
306        self.previousPageButton =   QPushButton('<')
307        self.previousPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_previousPage)
308        self._1x1Button =           QPushButton('1x1')
309        self._1x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_1x1)
310        self._2x1Button =           QPushButton('2x1')
311        self._2x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_2x1)
312        self._3x2Button =           QPushButton('3x2')
313        self._3x2Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_3x2)
314        self._6x4Button =           QPushButton('6x4')
315        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
316        self._9x6Button =           QPushButton('9x6')
317        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
318        self.nextPageButton =       QPushButton('>')
319        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
320
321        self.pageNumberLabel = QLabel(str(self.pageNumber)+"/ ...")
322
323        self.buttons = QWidget()
324        self.buttonsLayout = QHBoxLayout()
325        self.buttons.setLayout(self.buttonsLayout)
326        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.previousPageButton)
327        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._1x1Button)
328        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._2x1Button)
329        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._3x2Button)
330        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._6x4Button)
331        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._9x6Button)
332        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.nextPageButton)
333
334        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.pageNumberLabel)
335
336        self.addWidget(self.images)
337        self.addWidget(self.buttons)
338        self.setSizes([1525,82])

Initialize image gallery view.

Args: controller_: Parent ImageGalleryController instance shapeMode: Initial grid layout mode (defaults to 3x2)

controller
shapeMode
pageNumber
imagesControllers
images
imagesLayout
previousPageButton
nextPageButton
pageNumberLabel
buttons

def currentPage(self): 
340    def currentPage(self): 
341        """
342        Get current page number.
343        
344        Returns:
345            int: Current page index (0-based)
346        """
347        return self.pageNumber

Get current page number.

Returns: int: Current page index (0-based)

def changePageNumber(self, step): 
349    def changePageNumber(self,step):
350        """
351        Navigate to different page with wraparound.
352        
353        Changes the current page by the specified step, with automatic
354        wraparound at the beginning and end of the page range.
355        
356        Args:
357            step (int): Page increment/decrement (+1 for next, -1 for previous)
358        """
359        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(",step,")")
360
361        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
362        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
363
364        if len(self.controller.model.processPipes) > 0 :
365
366            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
367            if (self.pageNumber+step) > maxPage-1:
368                self.pageNumber = 0
369            elif (self.pageNumber+step) <0:
370                self.pageNumber = maxPage-1
371            else:
372                self.pageNumber  = self.pageNumber+step
373            self.updateImages()
374            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
375            if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:",self.pageNumber," | max page:",maxPage,")")

Navigate to different page with wraparound.

Changes the current page by the specified step, with automatic wraparound at the beginning and end of the page range.

Args: step (int): Page increment/decrement (+1 for next, -1 for previous)

def updateImages(self): 
377    def updateImages(self):
378        """
379        Refresh image display for current page.
380        
381        Updates all image widgets in the grid with placeholder content
382        and refreshes the page number display. Actual images are loaded
383        asynchronously by the model.
384        """
385        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages(",")")
386
387        """ update images content """
388        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
389        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
390        
391        index=0
392        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
393            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
394                # get image controllers                                                                                         
395                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
396                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())                                                 
397                index +=1                                                                                                                                                                                                           
398        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber)+"/"+str(maxPage-1))

Refresh image display for current page.

Updates all image widgets in the grid with placeholder content and refreshes the page number display. Actual images are loaded asynchronously by the model.

def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename): 
400    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
401        """
402        Update specific image in grid with loaded content.
403        
404        Args:
405            idx (int): Index of image within current page
406            processPipe (ProcessPipe): Loaded image processing pipeline
407            filename (str): Image filename for status display
408        """
409        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage(",")")
410        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]                                 
411        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
412        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image "+filename+" done!")

Update specific image in grid with loaded content.

Args: idx (int): Index of image within current page processPipe (ProcessPipe): Loaded image processing pipeline filename (str): Image filename for status display

def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self): 
414    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
415        """
416        Clear current grid layout widgets.
417        
418        Removes all image widgets from the grid layout and cleans up
419        memory by deleting widget references.
420        """
421        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
422
423        for w in self.imagesControllers:
424            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
425            w.view.deleteLater()
426        self.imagesControllers = []

Clear current grid layout widgets.

Removes all image widgets from the grid layout and cleans up memory by deleting widget references.

def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self): 
428    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
429        """
430        Create new grid layout widgets based on current shape mode.
431        
432        Generates ImageWidgetController instances for each position in
433        the grid and adds them to the layout with proper positioning.
434        """
435        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
436
437        imageIndex = 0
438        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
439            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
440                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
441                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
442                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view,i,j)
443                imageIndex +=1

Create new grid layout widgets based on current shape mode.

Generates ImageWidgetController instances for each position in the grid and adds them to the layout with proper positioning.

def wheelEvent(self, event): 
445    def wheelEvent(self, event):
446        """
447        Handle mouse wheel navigation between pages.
448        
449        Args:
450            event: Qt wheel event with scroll direction
451        """
452        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent(",")")
453
454        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0 :     
455            self.changePageNumber(+1)
456            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
457                self.controller.selectImage(0)
458
459        else :                              
460            self.changePageNumber(-1)
461            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
462                self.controller.selectImage(0)
463        event.accept()

Handle mouse wheel navigation between pages.

Args: event: Qt wheel event with scroll direction

def mousePressEvent(self, event): 
465    def mousePressEvent(self,event):
466        """
467        Handle image selection clicks.
468        
469        Determines which image was clicked based on mouse position
470        and notifies the controller for selection handling.
471        
472        Args:
473            event: Qt mouse press event with position
474        """
475        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent(",")")
476
477        # self.childAt(event.pos()) return QLabel .parent() should be ImageWidget object
478        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(),ImageWidgetView):
479            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
480        else:
481            id = -1
482
483        if id != -1: # an image is clicked select it!
484            self.controller.selectImage(id)
485        event.accept()

Handle image selection clicks.

Determines which image was clicked based on mouse position and notifies the controller for selection handling.

Args: event: Qt mouse press event with position

class AppView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow): 
489class AppView(QMainWindow):
490    """
491    Main application window for uHDR HDR image editing software.
492    
493    Provides the primary user interface for uHDR with comprehensive menu system,
494    dockable panels, and central image gallery. Manages window geometry, screen
495    configuration, and application-wide functionality including file operations,
496    HDR display management, and export capabilities.
497    
498    Window Structure:
499    - Central Widget: Image gallery with pagination
500    - Right Dock: Multi-panel interface (Edit/Info/Aesthetics)
501    - Menu Bar: File, Display HDR, Export, Dock, Preferences
502    - Status Bar: Real-time operation feedback
503    
504    Attributes:
505        - controller (AppController): Parent application controller
506        - imageGalleryController (ImageGalleryController): Central gallery management
507        - dock (MultiDockController): Right panel controller
508        - topContainer (QWidget): Central widget container
509        - menuExport (QAction): Export menu action reference
510        - menuExportAll (QAction): Export all menu action reference
511    """
512    def __init__(self, _controller = None, shapeMode=None, HDRcontroller=None):
513        """
514        Initialize main application window.
515        
516        Args:
517            _controller (AppController): Parent application controller
518            shapeMode: Initial gallery layout mode
519            HDRcontroller: HDR display controller reference
520        """
521        super().__init__()
522        # --------------------
523        scale = 0.8
524        # --------------------   
525        # attributes
526        self.controller = _controller
527        self.setWindowGeometry(scale=scale)
528        self.setWindowTitle('uHDR - Rémi Cozot (c) 2020-2021')      # title  
529        self.statusBar().showMessage('Welcome to uHDR!')         # status bar
530
531        self.topContainer = QWidget()
532        self.topLayout = QHBoxLayout()
533
534        self.imageGalleryController = controller.ImageGalleryController(self)
535
536        self.topLayout.addWidget(self.imageGalleryController.view)
537
538        self.topContainer.setLayout(self.topLayout)
539        self.setCentralWidget(self.topContainer)
540        # ----------------------------------
541        self.dock = controller.MultiDockController(self, HDRcontroller)
542        self.addDockWidget(Qt.RightDockWidgetArea,self.dock.view)
543        self.resizeDocks([self.dock.view],[int(self.controller.screenSize[0].width()*scale//4)],Qt.Horizontal)
544
545        # ----------------------------------
546        # build menu
547        self.buildFileMenu()
548        self.buildDockMenu()
549        self.buildDisplayHDR()
550        self.buildExport()
551        self.buildPreferences()
552    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
553    def getImageGalleryController(self): 
554        """
555        Get reference to the central image gallery controller.
556        
557        Returns:
558            ImageGalleryController: Central gallery management controller
559        """
560        return self.imageGalleryController
561    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
562    def resizeEvent(self, event): 
563        """
564        Handle Qt window resize events.
565        
566        Args:
567            event: Qt resize event object
568        """
569        super().resizeEvent(event)
570    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
571    def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8):
572        """
573        Configure window size and position based on available displays.
574        
575        Automatically detects multiple displays and positions window on
576        secondary display if available, otherwise uses primary display.
577        
578        Args:
579            scale (float): Window scaling factor (default 0.8)
580        """
581        displayCoord = QDesktopWidget().screenGeometry(1)
582        if len(self.controller.screenSize) > 1:
583            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[1].width(), self.controller.screenSize[1].height()
584        else:
585            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[0].width(), self.controller.screenSize[0].height()
586
587        self.setGeometry(displayCoord.left(), displayCoord.top()+50, math.floor(width*scale), math.floor(height*scale))
588        self.showMaximized()
589    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
590    def buildFileMenu(self):
591        """
592        Create file operations menu with directory selection, save, and quit.
593        
594        Menu Items:
595        - Select directory (Ctrl+O): Choose working directory
596        - Save (Ctrl+S): Save ProcessPipe metadata 
597        - Quit (Ctrl+Q): Exit application with cleanup
598        """
599        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
600        fileMenu = menubar.addMenu('&File')# file menu
601
602        selectDir = QAction('&Select directory', self)        
603        selectDir.setShortcut('Ctrl+O')
604        selectDir.setStatusTip('[File] select a directory')
605        selectDir.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSelectDir)
606        fileMenu.addAction(selectDir)
607
608        selectSave = QAction('&Save', self)        
609        selectSave.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')
610        selectSave.setStatusTip('[File] saving processpipe metadata')
611        selectSave.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSave)
612        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)
613
614        quit = QAction('&Quit', self)        
615        quit.setShortcut('Ctrl+Q')
616        quit.setStatusTip('[File] saving updates and quit')
617        quit.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackQuit)
618        fileMenu.addAction(quit)
619    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    
620    def buildPreferences(self):
621        """
622        Create HDR display preferences menu with dynamic display selection.
623        
624        Automatically generates menu items for each configured HDR display
625        from preferences, allowing runtime switching between different HDR
626        monitor configurations.
627        """
628
629        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
630        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')# file menu
631
632        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
633
634        # function for callback
635        def cbd(tag): 
636            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
637            self.statusBar().showMessage("swithcing HDR Display to: "+tag+"!")
638            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
639            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])        
640
641        prefDisplays = []
642        for i,d in enumerate(displayList):
643            if d != 'none':
644                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to '+d, self) 
645                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
646                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
647                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)
648
649    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
650    def buildDisplayHDR(self):
651        """
652        Create HDR display menu for real-time preview and comparison.
653        
654        Menu Items:
655        - Display HDR image (Ctrl+H): Show on HDR monitor
656        - Compare raw and edited (Ctrl+C): Side-by-side comparison
657        - Reset HDR display (Ctrl+K): Clear HDR preview
658        """
659        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
660        displayHDRmenu = menubar.addMenu('&Display HDR')# file menu
661
662        displayHDR = QAction('&Display HDR image', self)        
663        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+H')
664        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] display HDR image')
665        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackDisplayHDR)
666        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
667        # ------------------------------------
668        displayHDR = QAction('&Compare raw and edited HDR image', self)        
669        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+C')
670        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] compare raw HDR image and edited one')
671        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCompareRawEditedHDR)
672        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
673        # ------------------------------------
674        closeHDR = QAction('&reset HDR display', self)        
675        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
676        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
677        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)
678        displayHDRmenu.addAction(closeHDR)
679    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
680    def buildExport(self):
681        """
682        Create export menu for saving processed HDR images.
683        
684        Menu Items:
685        - Export to [display] (Ctrl+X): Export current image for HDR display
686        - Export All to [display] (Ctrl+Y): Batch export all images
687        
688        Display target automatically updates based on preferences selection.
689        """
690        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
691        exportHDR = menubar.addMenu('&Export HDR image')# file menu
692
693        self.menuExport = QAction('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
694        self.menuExport.setShortcut('Ctrl+X')
695        self.menuExport.setStatusTip('[Export HDR image] save HDR image file for HDR display')
696        self.menuExport.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportHDR)
697        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExport)
698
699        self.menuExportAll = QAction('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
700        self.menuExportAll.setShortcut('Ctrl+Y')
701        self.menuExportAll.setStatusTip('[Export all HDR images] save HDR image files for HDR display.')
702        self.menuExportAll.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportAllHDR)
703        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExportAll)
704    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
705    def buildDockMenu(self):
706        """
707        Create dock panel switching menu for right-side interface.
708        
709        Menu Items:
710        - Info and Metadata (Ctrl+I): Image information panel
711        - Edit (Ctrl+E): HDR editing controls panel  
712        - Image Aesthetics (Ctrl+A): Aesthetics analysis panel
713        """
714        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
715        dockMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Dock')# file menu
716
717        info = QAction('&Info. and Metadata', self)        
718        info.setShortcut('Ctrl+I')
719        info.setStatusTip('[Dock] image information dock')
720        info.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateINFO)
721        dockMenu.addAction(info)
722
723        edit = QAction('&Edit', self)        
724        edit.setShortcut('Ctrl+E')
725        edit.setStatusTip('[Dock] image editing dock')
726        edit.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateEDIT)
727        dockMenu.addAction(edit)
728
729        iqa = QAction('&Image Aesthetics', self)        
730        iqa.setShortcut('Ctrl+A')
731        iqa.setStatusTip('[Dock] image aesthetics dock')
732        iqa.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateMIAM)
733        dockMenu.addAction(iqa)
734    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
735    def closeEvent(self, event):
736        """
737        Handle application shutdown with proper cleanup.
738        
739        Saves all ProcessPipe metadata and closes HDR display before exit.
740        
741        Args:
742            event: Qt close event
743        """
744        if pref.verbose: print(" [CB] >> AppView.closeEvent()>> ... closing")
745        self.imageGalleryController.save()
746        self.controller.hdrDisplay.close()

Main application window for uHDR HDR image editing software.

Provides the primary user interface for uHDR with comprehensive menu system, dockable panels, and central image gallery. Manages window geometry, screen configuration, and application-wide functionality including file operations, HDR display management, and export capabilities.

Window Structure:

  • Central Widget: Image gallery with pagination
  • Right Dock: Multi-panel interface (Edit/Info/Aesthetics)
  • Menu Bar: File, Display HDR, Export, Dock, Preferences
  • Status Bar: Real-time operation feedback

Attributes: - controller (AppController): Parent application controller - imageGalleryController (ImageGalleryController): Central gallery management - dock (MultiDockController): Right panel controller - topContainer (QWidget): Central widget container - menuExport (QAction): Export menu action reference - menuExportAll (QAction): Export all menu action reference

AppView(_controller=None, shapeMode=None, HDRcontroller=None) 
512    def __init__(self, _controller = None, shapeMode=None, HDRcontroller=None):
513        """
514        Initialize main application window.
515        
516        Args:
517            _controller (AppController): Parent application controller
518            shapeMode: Initial gallery layout mode
519            HDRcontroller: HDR display controller reference
520        """
521        super().__init__()
522        # --------------------
523        scale = 0.8
524        # --------------------   
525        # attributes
526        self.controller = _controller
527        self.setWindowGeometry(scale=scale)
528        self.setWindowTitle('uHDR - Rémi Cozot (c) 2020-2021')      # title  
529        self.statusBar().showMessage('Welcome to uHDR!')         # status bar
530
531        self.topContainer = QWidget()
532        self.topLayout = QHBoxLayout()
533
534        self.imageGalleryController = controller.ImageGalleryController(self)
535
536        self.topLayout.addWidget(self.imageGalleryController.view)
537
538        self.topContainer.setLayout(self.topLayout)
539        self.setCentralWidget(self.topContainer)
540        # ----------------------------------
541        self.dock = controller.MultiDockController(self, HDRcontroller)
542        self.addDockWidget(Qt.RightDockWidgetArea,self.dock.view)
543        self.resizeDocks([self.dock.view],[int(self.controller.screenSize[0].width()*scale//4)],Qt.Horizontal)
544
545        # ----------------------------------

547        self.buildFileMenu()
548        self.buildDockMenu()
549        self.buildDisplayHDR()
550        self.buildExport()

564        Handle Qt window resize events.

def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8): 
571    def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8):
572        """
573        Configure window size and position based on available displays.
574        
575        Automatically detects multiple displays and positions window on
576        secondary display if available, otherwise uses primary display.
577        
578        Args:
579            scale (float): Window scaling factor (default 0.8)
580        """
581        displayCoord = QDesktopWidget().screenGeometry(1)
582        if len(self.controller.screenSize) > 1:
583            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[1].width(), self.controller.screenSize[1].height()
584        else:
585            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[0].width(), self.controller.screenSize[0].height()
586
587        self.setGeometry(displayCoord.left(), displayCoord.top()+50, math.floor(width*scale), math.floor(height*scale))
588        self.showMaximized()

Configure window size and position based on available displays.

Automatically detects multiple displays and positions window on secondary display if available, otherwise uses primary display.

Args: scale (float): Window scaling factor (default 0.8)

def buildFileMenu(self): 
590    def buildFileMenu(self):
591        """
592        Create file operations menu with directory selection, save, and quit.
593        
594        Menu Items:
595        - Select directory (Ctrl+O): Choose working directory
596        - Save (Ctrl+S): Save ProcessPipe metadata 
597        - Quit (Ctrl+Q): Exit application with cleanup
598        """
599        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
600        fileMenu = menubar.addMenu('&File')# file menu
601
602        selectDir = QAction('&Select directory', self)        
603        selectDir.setShortcut('Ctrl+O')
604        selectDir.setStatusTip('[File] select a directory')
605        selectDir.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSelectDir)
606        fileMenu.addAction(selectDir)
607
608        selectSave = QAction('&Save', self)        
609        selectSave.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')
610        selectSave.setStatusTip('[File] saving processpipe metadata')
611        selectSave.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSave)
612        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)
613
614        quit = QAction('&Quit', self)        
615        quit.setShortcut('Ctrl+Q')
616        quit.setStatusTip('[File] saving updates and quit')
617        quit.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackQuit)
618        fileMenu.addAction(quit)

Create file operations menu with directory selection, save, and quit.

Menu Items:

  • Select directory (Ctrl+O): Choose working directory
  • Save (Ctrl+S): Save ProcessPipe metadata
  • Quit (Ctrl+Q): Exit application with cleanup
def buildPreferences(self): 
620    def buildPreferences(self):
621        """
622        Create HDR display preferences menu with dynamic display selection.
623        
624        Automatically generates menu items for each configured HDR display
625        from preferences, allowing runtime switching between different HDR
626        monitor configurations.
627        """
628
629        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
630        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')# file menu
631
632        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
633
634        # function for callback
635        def cbd(tag): 
636            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
637            self.statusBar().showMessage("swithcing HDR Display to: "+tag+"!")
638            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
639            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])        
640
641        prefDisplays = []
642        for i,d in enumerate(displayList):
643            if d != 'none':
644                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to '+d, self) 
645                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
646                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
647                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)

Create HDR display preferences menu with dynamic display selection.

Automatically generates menu items for each configured HDR display from preferences, allowing runtime switching between different HDR monitor configurations.

def buildDisplayHDR(self): 
650    def buildDisplayHDR(self):
651        """
652        Create HDR display menu for real-time preview and comparison.
653        
654        Menu Items:
655        - Display HDR image (Ctrl+H): Show on HDR monitor
656        - Compare raw and edited (Ctrl+C): Side-by-side comparison
657        - Reset HDR display (Ctrl+K): Clear HDR preview
658        """
659        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
660        displayHDRmenu = menubar.addMenu('&Display HDR')# file menu
661
662        displayHDR = QAction('&Display HDR image', self)        
663        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+H')
664        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] display HDR image')
665        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackDisplayHDR)
666        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
667        # ------------------------------------
668        displayHDR = QAction('&Compare raw and edited HDR image', self)        
669        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+C')
670        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] compare raw HDR image and edited one')
671        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCompareRawEditedHDR)
672        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
673        # ------------------------------------
674        closeHDR = QAction('&reset HDR display', self)        
675        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
676        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
677        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)
678        displayHDRmenu.addAction(closeHDR)

Create HDR display menu for real-time preview and comparison.

Menu Items:

  • Display HDR image (Ctrl+H): Show on HDR monitor
  • Compare raw and edited (Ctrl+C): Side-by-side comparison
  • Reset HDR display (Ctrl+K): Clear HDR preview
def buildExport(self): 
680    def buildExport(self):
681        """
682        Create export menu for saving processed HDR images.
683        
684        Menu Items:
685        - Export to [display] (Ctrl+X): Export current image for HDR display
686        - Export All to [display] (Ctrl+Y): Batch export all images
687        
688        Display target automatically updates based on preferences selection.
689        """
690        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
691        exportHDR = menubar.addMenu('&Export HDR image')# file menu
692
693        self.menuExport = QAction('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
694        self.menuExport.setShortcut('Ctrl+X')
695        self.menuExport.setStatusTip('[Export HDR image] save HDR image file for HDR display')
696        self.menuExport.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportHDR)
697        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExport)
698
699        self.menuExportAll = QAction('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
700        self.menuExportAll.setShortcut('Ctrl+Y')
701        self.menuExportAll.setStatusTip('[Export all HDR images] save HDR image files for HDR display.')
702        self.menuExportAll.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportAllHDR)
703        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExportAll)

Create export menu for saving processed HDR images.

Menu Items:

  • Export to [display] (Ctrl+X): Export current image for HDR display
  • Export All to [display] (Ctrl+Y): Batch export all images

Display target automatically updates based on preferences selection.

def buildDockMenu(self): 
705    def buildDockMenu(self):
706        """
707        Create dock panel switching menu for right-side interface.
708        
709        Menu Items:
710        - Info and Metadata (Ctrl+I): Image information panel
711        - Edit (Ctrl+E): HDR editing controls panel  
712        - Image Aesthetics (Ctrl+A): Aesthetics analysis panel
713        """
714        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
715        dockMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Dock')# file menu
716
717        info = QAction('&Info. and Metadata', self)        
718        info.setShortcut('Ctrl+I')
719        info.setStatusTip('[Dock] image information dock')
720        info.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateINFO)
721        dockMenu.addAction(info)
722
723        edit = QAction('&Edit', self)        
724        edit.setShortcut('Ctrl+E')
725        edit.setStatusTip('[Dock] image editing dock')
726        edit.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateEDIT)
727        dockMenu.addAction(edit)
728
729        iqa = QAction('&Image Aesthetics', self)        
730        iqa.setShortcut('Ctrl+A')
731        iqa.setStatusTip('[Dock] image aesthetics dock')
732        iqa.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateMIAM)
733        dockMenu.addAction(iqa)

Create dock panel switching menu for right-side interface.

Menu Items:

  • Info and Metadata (Ctrl+I): Image information panel
  • Edit (Ctrl+E): HDR editing controls panel
  • Image Aesthetics (Ctrl+A): Aesthetics analysis panel
def closeEvent(self, event): 
735    def closeEvent(self, event):
736        """
737        Handle application shutdown with proper cleanup.
738        
739        Saves all ProcessPipe metadata and closes HDR display before exit.
740        
741        Args:
742            event: Qt close event
743        """
744        if pref.verbose: print(" [CB] >> AppView.closeEvent()>> ... closing")
745        self.imageGalleryController.save()
746        self.controller.hdrDisplay.close()

Handle application shutdown with proper cleanup.

Saves all ProcessPipe metadata and closes HDR display before exit.

Args: event: Qt close event

class ImageInfoView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
750class ImageInfoView(QSplitter):
751    """
752    Image information and metadata display panel.
753    
754    Provides comprehensive display of image metadata including EXIF data,
755    technical parameters, and user-defined tags. Supports interactive editing
756    of custom metadata fields for workflow management and image classification.
757    
758    Layout Structure:
759    - Top: Image preview widget
760    - Bottom: Scrollable metadata form with:
761      * Technical metadata (name, path, size, dynamic range, etc.)
762      * EXIF data (exposure, ISO, camera, lens, etc.)
763      * User-defined workflow tags (organized by groups)
764    
765    Attributes:
766        - controller (ImageInfoController): Parent controller reference
767        - imageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Image preview controller
768        - layout (QFormLayout): Metadata fields layout
769        - imageName, imagePath, imageSize, etc.: Technical metadata widgets
770        - userDefinedTags (list[AdvanceCheckBox]): Custom metadata checkboxes
771        - scroll (QScrollArea): Scrollable container for metadata fields
772    """
773    def __init__(self, _controller):
774        """
775        Initialize image info view with metadata form.
776        
777        Args:
778            _controller (ImageInfoController): Parent controller instance
779        """
780        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__(",")")
781
782        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
783
784        self.controller = _controller
785
786        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
787
788        self.layout = QFormLayout()
789
790        # ---------------------------------------------------
791        self.imageName =            AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
792        self.imagePath =            AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
793        self.imageSize =            AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ",   self.layout, callBack=None)
794        self.imageDynamicRange =    AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
795        self.colorSpace =           AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ",      self.layout, callBack=None)
796        self.imageType =            AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)                     
797        self.imageBPS =             AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ",  self.layout, callBack=None)
798        self.imageExpoTime =        AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ",    self.layout, callBack=None)
799        self.imageFNumber =         AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ",          self.layout, callBack=None)          
800        self.imageISO =             AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ",              self.layout, callBack=None)           
801        self.imageCamera =          AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ",           self.layout, callBack=None)      
802        self.imageSoftware =        AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ",         self.layout, callBack=None)      
803        self.imageLens =            AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
804        self.imageFocalLength =     AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ",     self.layout, callBack=None)
805        # ---------------------------------------------------
806        # ---------------------------------------------------
807        line = QFrame()
808        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
809        self.layout.addRow(line)
810        # ---------------------------------------------------
811        #  user defined tags
812        # --------------------------------------------------
813        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
814        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
815        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
816        self.userDefinedTags = []
817        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
818            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
819            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
820            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
821                self.userDefinedTags.append( AdvanceCheckBox(self,groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
822            line = QFrame()
823            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
824            self.layout.addRow(line)
825        # --------------------------------------------------
826
827
828        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
829
830        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
831        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
832        self.container = QLabel()
833        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
834        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
835        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
836
837        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
838        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
839        self.setSizes([60,40])
840
841    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe): 
842        """
843        Update display with new image and populate all metadata fields.
844        
845        Extracts comprehensive metadata from the ProcessPipe's image including
846        EXIF data, technical parameters, and user-defined tags. Updates all
847        form fields and checkboxes to reflect current image state.
848        
849        Args:
850            processPipe (ProcessPipe): Processing pipeline containing image with metadata
851            
852        Returns:
853            Result of imageWidgetController.setImage() operation
854        """
855        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
856        # ---------------------------------------------------
857        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(",image_.name,")")
858        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] != None: self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
859        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
860        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] != None: self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
861        else: self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
862        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] != None: self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'])+" x "+ str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
863        else: self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
864        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] != None: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
865        else: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
866        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] != None: self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
867        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
868        if image_.type != None: self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))       
869        else: self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
870        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] != None: self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
871        else: self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
872        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] != None: self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0])+" / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
873        else: self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
874        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] != None: self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))    
875        else: self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
876        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] != None: self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))       
877        else: self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
878        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] != None: self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])      
879        else: self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
880        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] != None: self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])      
881        else: self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
882        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] != None: self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
883        else: self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
884        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] != None: self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
885        else: self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
886        # ---------------------------------------------------
887        self.controller.callBackActive = False
888        # ---------------------------------------------------
889        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
890        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
891
892        for i,tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
893            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
894            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
895            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
896                # find advanced checkbox
897                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
898                    if (acb.rightText ==tag[0] ) and (acb.leftText== groupKey):
899                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
900                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
901                        acb.setState(on_off)
902                        break  
903        # ---------------------------------------------------        
904        self.controller.callBackActive = True
905        # ---------------------------------------------------
906        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)
907
908    def metadataChange(self,metaGroup,metaTag, on_off): 
909        """
910        Handle user changes to custom metadata tags.
911        
912        Args:
913            metaGroup (str): Metadata group name
914            metaTag (str): Specific tag name
915            on_off (bool): New tag state
916        """
917        if self.controller.callBackActive: self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup,metaTag, on_off)

Image information and metadata display panel.

Provides comprehensive display of image metadata including EXIF data, technical parameters, and user-defined tags. Supports interactive editing of custom metadata fields for workflow management and image classification.

Layout Structure:

  • Top: Image preview widget
  • Bottom: Scrollable metadata form with:
    • Technical metadata (name, path, size, dynamic range, etc.)
    • EXIF data (exposure, ISO, camera, lens, etc.)
    • User-defined workflow tags (organized by groups)

Attributes: - controller (ImageInfoController): Parent controller reference - imageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Image preview controller - layout (QFormLayout): Metadata fields layout - imageName, imagePath, imageSize, etc.: Technical metadata widgets - userDefinedTags (list[AdvanceCheckBox]): Custom metadata checkboxes - scroll (QScrollArea): Scrollable container for metadata fields

ImageInfoView(_controller) 
773    def __init__(self, _controller):
774        """
775        Initialize image info view with metadata form.
776        
777        Args:
778            _controller (ImageInfoController): Parent controller instance
779        """
780        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__(",")")
781
782        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
783
784        self.controller = _controller
785
786        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
787
788        self.layout = QFormLayout()
789
790        # ---------------------------------------------------
791        self.imageName =            AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
792        self.imagePath =            AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
793        self.imageSize =            AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ",   self.layout, callBack=None)
794        self.imageDynamicRange =    AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
795        self.colorSpace =           AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ",      self.layout, callBack=None)
796        self.imageType =            AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)                     
797        self.imageBPS =             AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ",  self.layout, callBack=None)
798        self.imageExpoTime =        AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ",    self.layout, callBack=None)
799        self.imageFNumber =         AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ",          self.layout, callBack=None)          
800        self.imageISO =             AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ",              self.layout, callBack=None)           
801        self.imageCamera =          AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ",           self.layout, callBack=None)      
802        self.imageSoftware =        AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ",         self.layout, callBack=None)      
803        self.imageLens =            AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
804        self.imageFocalLength =     AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ",     self.layout, callBack=None)
805        # ---------------------------------------------------
806        # ---------------------------------------------------
807        line = QFrame()
808        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
809        self.layout.addRow(line)
810        # ---------------------------------------------------
811        #  user defined tags
812        # --------------------------------------------------
813        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
814        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
815        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
816        self.userDefinedTags = []
817        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
818            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
819            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
820            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
821                self.userDefinedTags.append( AdvanceCheckBox(self,groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
822            line = QFrame()
823            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
824            self.layout.addRow(line)
825        # --------------------------------------------------
826
827
828        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
829
830        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
831        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
832        self.container = QLabel()
833        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
834        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
835        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
836
837        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
838        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
839        self.setSizes([60,40])

Initialize image info view with metadata form.

Args: _controller (ImageInfoController): Parent controller instance

controller
imageWidgetController

def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe): 
841    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe): 
842        """
843        Update display with new image and populate all metadata fields.
844        
845        Extracts comprehensive metadata from the ProcessPipe's image including
846        EXIF data, technical parameters, and user-defined tags. Updates all
847        form fields and checkboxes to reflect current image state.
848        
849        Args:
850            processPipe (ProcessPipe): Processing pipeline containing image with metadata
851            
852        Returns:
853            Result of imageWidgetController.setImage() operation
854        """
855        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
856        # ---------------------------------------------------
857        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(",image_.name,")")
858        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] != None: self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
859        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
860        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] != None: self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
861        else: self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
862        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] != None: self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'])+" x "+ str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
863        else: self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
864        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] != None: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
865        else: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
866        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] != None: self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
867        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
868        if image_.type != None: self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))       
869        else: self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
870        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] != None: self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
871        else: self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
872        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] != None: self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0])+" / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
873        else: self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
874        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] != None: self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))    
875        else: self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
876        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] != None: self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))       
877        else: self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
878        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] != None: self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])      
879        else: self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
880        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] != None: self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])      
881        else: self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
882        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] != None: self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
883        else: self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
884        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] != None: self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
885        else: self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
886        # ---------------------------------------------------
887        self.controller.callBackActive = False
888        # ---------------------------------------------------
889        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
890        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
891
892        for i,tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
893            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
894            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
895            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
896                # find advanced checkbox
897                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
898                    if (acb.rightText ==tag[0] ) and (acb.leftText== groupKey):
899                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
900                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
901                        acb.setState(on_off)
902                        break  
903        # ---------------------------------------------------        
904        self.controller.callBackActive = True
905        # ---------------------------------------------------
906        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)

Update display with new image and populate all metadata fields.

Extracts comprehensive metadata from the ProcessPipe's image including EXIF data, technical parameters, and user-defined tags. Updates all form fields and checkboxes to reflect current image state.

Args: processPipe (ProcessPipe): Processing pipeline containing image with metadata

Returns: Result of imageWidgetController.setImage() operation

def metadataChange(self, metaGroup, metaTag, on_off): 
908    def metadataChange(self,metaGroup,metaTag, on_off): 
909        """
910        Handle user changes to custom metadata tags.
911        
912        Args:
913            metaGroup (str): Metadata group name
914            metaTag (str): Specific tag name
915            on_off (bool): New tag state
916        """
917        if self.controller.callBackActive: self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup,metaTag, on_off)

Handle user changes to custom metadata tags.

Args: metaGroup (str): Metadata group name metaTag (str): Specific tag name on_off (bool): New tag state

class AdvanceLineEdit: 
921class AdvanceLineEdit(object):
922    """
923    Enhanced line edit widget with label for metadata display.
924    
925    Provides a labeled text input widget optimized for displaying and
926    potentially editing metadata values in forms. Includes automatic
927    layout management and optional change callbacks.
928    
929    Attributes:
930        - label (QLabel): Display label for the field
931        - lineEdit (QLineEdit): Text input widget
932    """
933    def __init__(self, labelName, defaultText, layout, callBack=None):
934        """
935        Initialize labeled line edit widget.
936        
937        Args:
938            labelName (str): Display label text
939            defaultText (str): Initial/default text value
940            layout (QFormLayout): Parent layout to add widget to
941            callBack (function, optional): Text change callback function
942        """
943        self.label = QLabel(labelName)
944        self.lineEdit =QLineEdit(defaultText)
945        if callBack: self.lineEdit.textChanged.connect(callBack)
946        layout.addRow(self.label,self.lineEdit)
947
948    def setText(self, txt): 
949        """
950        Update the displayed text value.
951        
952        Args:
953            txt (str): New text to display
954        """
955        self.lineEdit.setText(txt)

Enhanced line edit widget with label for metadata display.

Provides a labeled text input widget optimized for displaying and potentially editing metadata values in forms. Includes automatic layout management and optional change callbacks.

Attributes: - label (QLabel): Display label for the field - lineEdit (QLineEdit): Text input widget

class AdvanceCheckBox: 
 959class AdvanceCheckBox(object):
 960    """
 961    Enhanced checkbox widget with label for metadata editing.
 962    
 963    Provides a labeled checkbox widget optimized for editing user-defined
 964    metadata tags. Supports callback functionality for metadata updates
 965    and automatic layout management.
 966    
 967    Attributes:
 968        - parent (ImageInfoView): Parent view for callback delegation
 969        - leftText (str): Left label text (group name)
 970        - rightText (str): Right label text (tag name)
 971        - label (QLabel): Display label widget
 972        - checkbox (QCheckBox): Checkbox control
 973    """
 974    def __init__(self, parent, leftText, rightText, defaultValue, layout):
 975        """
 976        Initialize labeled checkbox widget.
 977        
 978        Args:
 979            parent (ImageInfoView): Parent view for callbacks
 980            leftText (str): Left label text (metadata group)
 981            rightText (str): Right label text (metadata tag)
 982            defaultValue (bool): Initial checkbox state
 983            layout (QFormLayout): Parent layout to add widget to
 984        """
 985        self.parent = parent
 986
 987        self.leftText = leftText
 988        self.rightText = rightText
 989
 990        self.label = QLabel(leftText)
 991        self.checkbox =QCheckBox(rightText)
 992        self.checkbox.toggled.connect(self.toggled)
 993        layout.addRow(self.label,self.checkbox)
 994
 995    def setState(self, on_off): 
 996        """
 997        Set checkbox checked state.
 998        
 999        Args:
1000            on_off (bool): New checked state
1001        """
1002        self.checkbox.setChecked(on_off)
1003
1004    def toggled(self): 
1005        """
1006        Handle checkbox state changes and notify parent.
1007        """
1008        self.parent.metadataChange(self.leftText, self.rightText, self.checkbox.isChecked())
