class GeometryView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QFrame): 
2634class GeometryView(QFrame):
2635    """
2636    Geometric transformation controls for rotation and cropping adjustments.
2637    
2638    Provides sliders for basic geometric corrections including:
2639    - Vertical cropping adjustment: Fine-tune vertical positioning for aspect ratio cropping
2640    - Rotation: Small angle corrections for straightening images
2641    
2642    Layout:
2643    +------------------------------------------+
2644    | cropping adj. [slider] [value]          |
2645    | rotation      [slider] [value]          |
2646    +------------------------------------------+
2647    
2648    Attributes:
2649        - controller (GeometryController): Parent controller reference
2650        - sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement: Vertical cropping offset slider
2651        - valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement: Cropping adjustment value display
2652        - sliderRotation: Rotation angle slider
2653        - valueRotation: Rotation value display
2654    """
2655    def __init__(self, _controller):
2656        """
2657        Initialize geometry transformation interface.
2658        
2659        Args:
2660            _controller (GeometryController): Parent controller instance
2661        """
2662        super().__init__()
2663        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
2664        self.controller = _controller
2665
2666        self.vbox = QVBoxLayout()
2667
2668        # cropping adjustement 
2669        self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QFrame()
2670        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QHBoxLayout()
2671        self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setLayout(self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2672        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement =   QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
2673        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setRange(-100,+100)
2674        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setValue(0)
2675        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setSingleStep(1) 
2676        self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QLineEdit()
2677        self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setText(str(0.0))  
2678        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(QLabel("cropping adj."))
2679        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2680        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2681
2682        # rotation 
2683        self.frameRotation = QFrame()
2684        self.layoutRotation = QHBoxLayout()
2685        self.frameRotation.setLayout(self.layoutRotation)
2686        self.sliderRotation =   QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
2687        self.sliderRotation.setRange(-60,+60)
2688        self.sliderRotation.setValue(0)
2689        self.sliderRotation.setSingleStep(1) 
2690        self.valueRotation = QLineEdit()
2691        self.valueRotation.setText(str(0.0))  
2692        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(QLabel("rotation"))
2693        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(self.sliderRotation)
2694        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(self.valueRotation)
2695
2696        self.vbox.addWidget(self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2697        self.vbox.addWidget(self.frameRotation)
2698
2699        self.setLayout(self.vbox)
2700
2701        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.valueChanged.connect(self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustementChange)
2702        self.sliderRotation.valueChanged.connect(self.sliderRotationChange)
2703
2704    # callbacks
2705    def sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustementChange(self):
2706        """Handle vertical cropping adjustment changes."""
2707        v = self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.value()
2708        self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setText(str(v))
2709        # call controller
2710        self.controller.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustementChange(v)
2711
2712    def sliderRotationChange(self):
2713        """Handle rotation angle changes with 1/6 degree precision."""
2714        v = self.sliderRotation.value()/6
2715        self.valueRotation.setText(str(v))
2716        # call controller
2717        self.controller.sliderRotationChange(v)

Geometric transformation controls for rotation and cropping adjustments.

Provides sliders for basic geometric corrections including:

  • Vertical cropping adjustment: Fine-tune vertical positioning for aspect ratio cropping
  • Rotation: Small angle corrections for straightening images

Layout: +------------------------------------------+ | cropping adj. [slider] [value] | | rotation [slider] [value] | +------------------------------------------+

Attributes: - controller (GeometryController): Parent controller reference - sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement: Vertical cropping offset slider - valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement: Cropping adjustment value display - sliderRotation: Rotation angle slider - valueRotation: Rotation value display

GeometryView(_controller) 
2655    def __init__(self, _controller):
2656        """
2657        Initialize geometry transformation interface.
2658        
2659        Args:
2660            _controller (GeometryController): Parent controller instance
2661        """
2662        super().__init__()
2663        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
2664        self.controller = _controller
2665
2666        self.vbox = QVBoxLayout()
2667
2668        # cropping adjustement 
2669        self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QFrame()
2670        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QHBoxLayout()
2671        self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setLayout(self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2672        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement =   QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
2673        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setRange(-100,+100)
2674        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setValue(0)
2675        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setSingleStep(1) 
2676        self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement = QLineEdit()
2677        self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement.setText(str(0.0))  
2678        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(QLabel("cropping adj."))
2679        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2680        self.layoutCroppingVerticalAdjustement.addWidget(self.valueCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2681
2682        # rotation 
2683        self.frameRotation = QFrame()
2684        self.layoutRotation = QHBoxLayout()
2685        self.frameRotation.setLayout(self.layoutRotation)
2686        self.sliderRotation =   QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
2687        self.sliderRotation.setRange(-60,+60)
2688        self.sliderRotation.setValue(0)
2689        self.sliderRotation.setSingleStep(1) 
2690        self.valueRotation = QLineEdit()
2691        self.valueRotation.setText(str(0.0))  
2692        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(QLabel("rotation"))
2693        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(self.sliderRotation)
2694        self.layoutRotation.addWidget(self.valueRotation)
2695
2696        self.vbox.addWidget(self.frameCroppingVerticalAdjustement)
2697        self.vbox.addWidget(self.frameRotation)
2698
2699        self.setLayout(self.vbox)
2700
2701        self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustement.valueChanged.connect(self.sliderCroppingVerticalAdjustementChange)
2702        self.sliderRotation.valueChanged.connect(self.sliderRotationChange)

class ImageAestheticsView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
2721class ImageAestheticsView(QSplitter):
2722    """
2723    Image aesthetics analysis and color palette visualization interface.
2724    
2725    Provides tools for analyzing image aesthetics including dominant color
2726    extraction, color palette generation, and visual composition analysis.
2727    Uses K-means clustering for color palette extraction with configurable
2728    parameters.
2729    
2730    Layout Structure:
2731    - Top: Image preview showing current processing result
2732    - Bottom: Scrollable controls panel with:
2733      * Process output selector (which processing step to analyze)
2734      * Number of colors configuration (2-8 colors)
2735      * Generated color palette visualization
2736    
2737    Analysis Features:
2738    - Dominant color extraction using K-means clustering
2739    - Configurable color count (2-8 dominant colors)
2740    - Process step selection for analysis input
2741    - Visual color palette representation
2742    - Extensible for composition and strength line analysis
2743    
2744    Layout:
2745    +------------------------------------------+
2746    | [Image Preview]                          |
2747    +------------------------------------------+
2748    | color palette                            |
2749    | process output: [dropdown]               |
2750    | number of colors: [spinbox]              |
2751    | [Color Palette Visualization]           |
2752    +------------------------------------------+
2753    
2754    Attributes:
2755        - controller (ImageAestheticsController): Parent controller reference
2756        - imageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Main image display
2757        - labelColorPalette: Color palette section label
2758        - labelNodeSelector: Process output selection label
2759        - nodeSelector (QComboBox): Process step selection dropdown
2760        - labelColorsNumber: Color count configuration label
2761        - nbColors (QSpinBox): Number of colors to extract (2-8)
2762        - paletteImageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Color palette display
2763        - scroll (QScrollArea): Scrollable container for controls
2764    """
2765    def __init__(self, _controller, build=False):
2766        """
2767        Initialize image aesthetics analysis interface.
2768        
2769        Args:
2770            _controller (ImageAestheticsController): Parent controller instance
2771            build (bool): Whether to restore previous state during construction
2772        """
2773        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> AestheticsImageView.__init__(",")")
2774        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
2775
2776        self.controller = _controller
2777
2778        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
2779
2780        self.layout = QVBoxLayout()
2781
2782        # --------------- color palette: node selector(node name), color number, palette image.
2783        self.labelColorPalette = QLabel("color palette")
2784        self.labelNodeSelector = QLabel("process output:")
2785        self.nodeSelector = QComboBox(self)
2786
2787        # recover process nodes names from buildProcessPipe
2788        processNodeNameList = []
2789        emptyProcessPipe = model.EditImageModel.buildProcessPipe()
2790        for node in emptyProcessPipe.processNodes: processNodeNameList.append(node.name)
2791
2792        # add 'output' at the end to help user
2793        processNodeNameList.append('output')
2794
2795        self.nodeSelector.addItems(processNodeNameList)
2796        self.nodeSelector.setCurrentIndex(len(processNodeNameList)-1)
2797
2798        # QSpinBox
2799        self.labelColorsNumber = QLabel("number of colors:")
2800        self.nbColors = QSpinBox(self)
2801        self.nbColors.setRange(2,8)
2802        self.nbColors.setValue(5)
2803
2804        self.paletteImageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
2805        imgPalette = hdrCore.aesthetics.Palette('defaultLab5',np.linspace([0,0,0],[100,0,0],5),hdrCore.image.ColorSpace.build('Lab'), hdrCore.image.imageType.SDR).createImageOfPalette()
2806        self.paletteImageWidgetController.setImage(imgPalette)
2807        self.paletteImageWidgetController.view.setMinimumSize(40, 10)
2808
2809        # add widgets to layout
2810        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelColorPalette)
2811        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelNodeSelector)
2812        self.layout.addWidget(self.nodeSelector)
2813        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelColorsNumber)
2814        self.layout.addWidget(self.nbColors)
2815        self.layout.addWidget(self.paletteImageWidgetController.view)
2816
2817        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
2818
2819        # scroll and etc.
2820        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
2821        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
2822        self.container = QLabel()
2823        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
2824        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
2825        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
2826
2827        # add widget to QSplitter
2828        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
2829        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
2830        self.setSizes([60,40])
2831        # --------------- composition:
2832        # --------------- strength line:
2833
2834    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe, paletteImg):
2835        """
2836        Update display with new ProcessPipe and color palette.
2837        
2838        Args:
2839            processPipe (ProcessPipe): New processing pipeline to display
2840            paletteImg (numpy.ndarray): Generated color palette visualization
2841        """
2842        self.imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
2843        self.paletteImageWidgetController.setImage(paletteImg)

Image aesthetics analysis and color palette visualization interface.

Provides tools for analyzing image aesthetics including dominant color extraction, color palette generation, and visual composition analysis. Uses K-means clustering for color palette extraction with configurable parameters.

Layout Structure:

  • Top: Image preview showing current processing result
  • Bottom: Scrollable controls panel with:
    • Process output selector (which processing step to analyze)
    • Number of colors configuration (2-8 colors)
    • Generated color palette visualization

Analysis Features:

  • Dominant color extraction using K-means clustering
  • Configurable color count (2-8 dominant colors)
  • Process step selection for analysis input
  • Visual color palette representation
  • Extensible for composition and strength line analysis

Layout: +------------------------------------------+ | [Image Preview] | +------------------------------------------+ | color palette | | process output: [dropdown] | | number of colors: [spinbox] | | [Color Palette Visualization] | +------------------------------------------+

Attributes: - controller (ImageAestheticsController): Parent controller reference - imageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Main image display - labelColorPalette: Color palette section label - labelNodeSelector: Process output selection label - nodeSelector (QComboBox): Process step selection dropdown - labelColorsNumber: Color count configuration label - nbColors (QSpinBox): Number of colors to extract (2-8) - paletteImageWidgetController (ImageWidgetController): Color palette display - scroll (QScrollArea): Scrollable container for controls

ImageAestheticsView(_controller, build=False)

2766        """
2767        Initialize image aesthetics analysis interface.
2768        
2769        Args:
2770            _controller (ImageAestheticsController): Parent controller instance

2772        """

2784        self.labelNodeSelector = QLabel("process output:")
2785        self.nodeSelector = QComboBox(self)
2786

2788        processNodeNameList = []

2790        for node in emptyProcessPipe.processNodes: processNodeNameList.append(node.name)
2791
2792        # add 'output' at the end to help user
2793        processNodeNameList.append('output')
2794

2796        self.nodeSelector.setCurrentIndex(len(processNodeNameList)-1)
2797

2799        self.labelColorsNumber = QLabel("number of colors:")
2800        self.nbColors = QSpinBox(self)
2801        self.nbColors.setRange(2,8)
2802        self.nbColors.setValue(5)
2803
2804        self.paletteImageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
2805        imgPalette = hdrCore.aesthetics.Palette('defaultLab5',np.linspace([0,0,0],[100,0,0],5),hdrCore.image.ColorSpace.build('Lab'), hdrCore.image.imageType.SDR).createImageOfPalette()
2806        self.paletteImageWidgetController.setImage(imgPalette)
2807        self.paletteImageWidgetController.view.setMinimumSize(40, 10)
2808

2810        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelColorPalette)
2811        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelNodeSelector)
2812        self.layout.addWidget(self.nodeSelector)
2813        self.layout.addWidget(self.labelColorsNumber)
2814        self.layout.addWidget(self.nbColors)
2815        self.layout.addWidget(self.paletteImageWidgetController.view)
2816
2817        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
2818
2819        # scroll and etc.
2820        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
2821        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
2822        self.container = QLabel()
2823        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
2824        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
2825        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
2826
2827        # add widget to QSplitter
2828        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
2829        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
2830        self.setSizes([60,40])
2831        # --------------- composition:
2832        # --------------- strength line:

class ColorEditorsAutoView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QPushButton): 
2846class ColorEditorsAutoView(QPushButton):
2847    """
2848    Automatic color editor configuration button.
2849    
2850    Provides a single button interface for automatically configuring
2851    multiple color editors based on K-means analysis of image colors.
2852    When activated, analyzes the current image to extract dominant colors
2853    and sets up color editors with appropriate selection ranges.
2854    
2855    Warning: Activating this function will reset all existing color
2856    editor configurations to the automatically generated settings.
2857    
2858    Attributes:
2859        - controller (ColorEditorsAutoController): Parent controller reference
2860    """
2861    def __init__(self,controller):
2862        """
2863        Initialize automatic color editor configuration button.
2864        
2865        Args:
2866            controller (ColorEditorsAutoController): Parent controller instance
2867        """
2868        super().__init__("auto color selection [! reset edit]")
2869        self.controller = controller
2870
2871        self.clicked.connect(self.controller.auto)

Automatic color editor configuration button.

Provides a single button interface for automatically configuring multiple color editors based on K-means analysis of image colors. When activated, analyzes the current image to extract dominant colors and sets up color editors with appropriate selection ranges.

Warning: Activating this function will reset all existing color editor configurations to the automatically generated settings.

Attributes: - controller (ColorEditorsAutoController): Parent controller reference

ColorEditorsAutoView(controller) 
2861    def __init__(self,controller):
2862        """
2863        Initialize automatic color editor configuration button.
2864        
2865        Args:
2866            controller (ColorEditorsAutoController): Parent controller instance
2867        """
2868        super().__init__("auto color selection [! reset edit]")
2869        self.controller = controller
2870
2871        self.clicked.connect(self.controller.auto)

Initialize automatic color editor configuration button.

Args: controller (ColorEditorsAutoController): Parent controller instance

controller
